cont.entity_a: Rough adjustment release lock is difficult to adjust, and fine adjustment sticks. Body does not slide smoothly in the collar. Easy depth adjustment with a screw dial and lever clamp. Good quality and precision in adjustments.

The Bosch 1617EVS router is smooth, easy to depth adjust, and powerful. Router maintains speed well under load. Router has plenty of power and is well-made. Plenty of power for demanding tasks. Router is quiet and has a good speed control.
cont.entity_b: Gets hot during operation, ensure it's not covered. Stopped working after a few months; warranty expired. Requires daily reboot for optimal performance.

cont.entity_a: Bearings need replacement periodically, but this is common with Porter Cable as well.
Dust accumulation makes vertical adjustment difficult, leading to broken retainer snap rings.
Easy installation and perfect fit on the router table base.
cont.entity_b: Setup is easy but does not work with DSL modems. Easy to set up and works with cable internet.

cont.entity_a: Soft start feature is smoother than older models. Soft start feature prevents kickback on startup.
Variable speed (8,000-25,000 RPMs) and plenty of power. Soft start and variable speed features are beneficial.
Durable with both 1/2" and 1/4" chucks included.
cont.entity_b: Lightweight with a carry case, suitable for travel.

cont.entity_a: The router box was previously opened, and some parts were missing.
cont.entity_b: Received a broken piece, replacement needed.

cont.entity_a: Easy to adjust height without removing from the table. Collet changing is simple with included wrenches. Router works well in both handheld and table-mounted setups.
cont.entity_b: Not suitable as a regular DSL router. Issues with DNS passthrough in shared mode. Difficult to configure WEP; WPA setup is quick. Not easy to set up without IT knowledge.

cont.entity_a: Good value for the money with reliable performance.
